timeline.event: Company founded as M/s. Sis Ram Bir Singh in Rewari, Haryana, focusing on civil construction and infrastructure projects.
Expanded capabilities in railway and road construction, acquiring key machinery and technical expertise.
Rebranded as ML Enterprises; began handling large-scale railway siding projects PAN India.
Completed major EPC contracts in railway and roadway infrastructure, building a strong reputation in the domain.
Diversified into PEB warehouse, electrical, and FFS works; strengthened technical manpower and in-house survey units.
Transitioned into ML Enterprises LLP to support expansion and formalize partnerships.
Established automatic paver plant for in-house material production and enhanced construction efficiency.
Achieved a turnover of INR 53.31 Crore for FY 2024–2025, executing over 65 successful projects.
Currently executing projects worth INR 129.57 Crore across 8 Indian states, employing 90+ professionals.

expertise: Detailed Engineering Survey and Final Location Survey
Alignment Design for Railways and Roadways
Earthwork execution for Railways and Roadways
Laying and Linking of P. Way
Execution of Bridges for Rail and Road

projects.current: Projects worth INR 129.57 Crore under execution

facilities: Automatic paver plant for in-house production
Extensive fleet of machinery for construction activities

growth_and_learning.career_path: Clear career progression with regular promotions
growth_and_learning.training: Access to training programs, mentorship, and certifications

perks: Transport facility from site to guest house
T-shirts, bedding, blankets, and other essentials

meaningful_work.impact: Projects that contribute to industry growth and innovation

recruitment_and_careers.message: At ML Enterprises LLP, we don't just offer jobs—we build careers.
recruitment_and_careers.culture_promise: Workplace where your contribution matters, growth is supported, and success is celebrated.

summary.overview: ML Enterprises LLP is a seasoned civil and infrastructure company with five decades of experience across railway, road, bridge, silo, and industrial construction. Evolving from a traditional firm into a modern LLP, it combines technical expertise, innovation, and a strong client-focused culture to deliver excellence PAN India.
